scenes.background: Monica sighs, glancing between you and Bob.
scenes.description: Monica says, 'I just don't want us to get bogged down in endless discussions.'

options.text: Balancing quick actions with thorough planning can ensure we don't miss critical details.
options.analysis: You acknowledge both the need for speed and thoroughness, demonstrating empathy and perception.

options.text: I understand, Monica, but rushing might lead to mistakes that cost more time later.
options.analysis: You emphasize the risks of rushing, showing good self-regulation and social skills in addressing Monica's concerns.

options.text: We should find a middle ground where we act swiftly but also ensure quality.
options.analysis: You propose a balanced approach, valuing both speed and quality, demonstrating empathy and social skills.
